name: unzipit
description: random access unzip library for JavaScript

scripts.build: npm run build-min && npm run build-ts
scripts.build-min: rollup -c && google-closure-compiler --warning_level=VERBOSE --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --externs build/externs.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT_2019 --language_out=ECMASCRIPT_2019 --js dist/unzipit.js --js_output_file dist/unzipit.min.js && google-closure-compiler --warning_level=VERBOSE --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --externs build/externs.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT_2019 --language_out=ECMASCRIPT_2019 --js dist/unzipit-worker.js --js_output_file dist/unzipit-worker.min.js
